p: Sequence quality was checked with the Sanger Quality Check App (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA). Forward and reverse sequencing reads for each marker region were assembled into a contig using the BioEdit Sequence Alignment Editor [ 58]. The identity of all obtained sequences was confirmed as ITS or trnH- psbA through similarity to published sequences using the BLAST algorithm. The ITS2 fragment was extracted with ITSx [ 59].
